label: WordDelimiterTokenFilter
description: Splits words into subwords and performs optional transformations on subword groups. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Catenate All
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether all subword parts will be catenated. For example, if this is set to true, "Azure-Search-1" becomes "AzureSearch1". Default is false.

fields.label: Catenate Numbers
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether maximum runs of number parts will be catenated. For example, if this is set to true, "1-2" becomes "12". Default is false.

fields.label: Catenate Words
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether maximum runs of word parts will be catenated. For example, if this is set to true, "Azure-Search" becomes "AzureSearch". Default is false.

fields.label: Generate Number Parts
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to generate number subwords. Default is true.

fields.label: Generate Word Parts
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to generate part words. If set, causes parts of words to be generated; for example "AzureSearch" becomes "Azure" "Search". Default is true.

fields.label: Preserve Original
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether original words will be preserved and added to the subword list. Default is false.

fields.label: Protected Words
fields.tooltip: A list of tokens to protect from being delimited.

fields.label: Split On Case Change
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to split words on caseChange. For example, if this is set to true, "AzureSearch" becomes "Azure" "Search". Default is true.

fields.label: Split On Numerics
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to split on numbers. For example, if this is set to true, "Azure1Search" becomes "Azure" "1" "Search". Default is true.

fields.label: Stem English Possessive
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to remove trailing "'s" for each subword. Default is true.
